name: Musab Ahmed Khan
title: a Computer Science & Engineering Student
bio: Currently studying at Sabancı University as a CSE undergraduate student with High Honors (CGPA 3.89/4.0). Experienced in Full-stack development, ML, and Data Science. Moving into CS for healthcare, recent work includes organ-aware segmentation for biomedical imaging. Focused on scalable AI and software that solves real-world problems.
